tool_description: Shows climate related reports from different newspaper
name: climates
title: climates

api_list.name: Get climate news from different news website
api_list.description: Getting news from a particular website
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://climates.p.rapidapi.com/news/guardian"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climates.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://climates.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climates.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
